word:
In the early days of the message, I have passed through most trying ordeals in refuting false doctrines, and especially such doctrines as 


                                    -249- 

Pantheism [which] we are meeting now. We are passing over the same ground.--Letter 30, 1906, p. 2. (To "Dear Brethren and Sisters in Battle Creek," January 12, 1906.)
